name: delete_lines_in_region
description: CSI M (Delete Lines) within a scroll region removes current line and shifts up
comment: Print A-E on rows 0-4. DECSTBM(2,4) sets scroll region rows 1-3 (0-indexed), cursor -> (0,0). CUP(2,1) to (1,0). DL(1) deletes row 1 (B), C->row1, D->row2, blank->row3. Print X overwrites C at (1,0). Row 0=A, 1=X, 2=D, 3=blank, 4=E.
